passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

html > body > country-validate:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > form:nth-child(1) > moynat-form:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)

html > body > country-validate:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > form:nth-child(1) > moynat-form:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > country-validate:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(5) > footer:nth-child(14) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > country-validate:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(2) > offcanvas-menu:nth-child(5) > h2:nth-child(3)
